name: school-news-ENEJ
description: Application de gestion des actualités - Angular + .NET + MongoDB

scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run init-data"
scripts.init-data: sleep 15 && npm run create-users && sleep 2 && npm run create-news
scripts.stop: docker-compose down && pkill -f "dotnet run" && pkill -f "ng serve"
scripts.clean: npm run stop && docker-compose down -v && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install

author: Joey Cohen
